General.Name: Kerjaya Prospek Property Bhd
General.Description: Kerjaya Prospek Property Berhad engages in property development and construction businesses in Malaysia. The company operates through Property Development and Hospitality segments. It develops residential and commercial properties. In addition, the company is involved in hotel, food and beverage, and recreation operation; distribution of electricity; and leasing of properties. Further, it offers project management consultant services. Kerjaya Prospek Property Berhad was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
